dashboard.label: Splunk Cloud App Management
dashboard.description: Summary of new App Management Interface for Splunk Cloud

html.p: Splunk Cloud App Management provides self-service install, update, and uninstall of Splunk certified apps with the click of a button.

ul.li: New app management page allows for easier management, app updates, self-service installation and resolution of dynamic app dependencies.
Support for most Splunk certified and internally built New in 7.0! apps and add-ons
More robust app deployment with self-service action retries, and better restart notifications
